participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Creative and persistent, enjoying hands-on activities and always looking for new challenges.
participant_1.background: I love to edit videos and spend time with my pug on rainy days. My first purchase was a new teaching outfit to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine. if things are not done right i will redo them again and again. i sleep most of the day. I spend my free time fixing up junk cars and making YouTube videos about it.

participant_2.name: Emily Parker
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and creative, with a passion for family and a love for culinary adventures.
participant_2.background: My children are my whole world, and I would love to find someone to share my love of Christmas with. I am going to use my creativity to come up with some exciting recipes for the vegetables I grew in my garden. i am well built and tall. My most difficult job was cutting down a large tree that had fallen on a power line. I sometimes drink too much wine when I go on wine tours.

content.text: Hello!
Hi!
What do you do for fun?
I love to garden. I just grew a bunch of vegetables this summer and I'm going to use my creativity to come up with some exciting recipes.
That's so cool! I love to fix up junk cars and make YouTube videos about it.
That's really interesting! What kind of cars do you like to work on?
I like to work on old muscle cars. I just bought a new teaching outfit to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine.
That's really great! I'm a teacher too, and I love to inspire my students.
What grade do you teach?
I teach kindergarten.
That's awesome! I love working with kids.
Me too!
What's your favorite Christmas tradition?
My favorite Christmas tradition is watching Christmas movies with my kids.
That's so cute! I love watching Christmas movies too.
Me too!
It looks like we have a lot in common!
I think so too!
I'd love to get to know you better.
Me too!
